participant_1.background:
My worst nightmare is that my dog Petrucci will die.
My eye contact issues can get in the way of my work, but I'm trying my best to overcome them.
i used to wear glasses as a child.
i work at a factory.
My favorite type of food is locally sourced, organic food.

participant_2.background:
I keep a healthy weight for my age.
i drive a four wheel drive vehicle.
I look for someone who can match my energy and who is also interested in spirituality.
i regularly go to the gym.
i enjoy walking around the park.

content.text: It's great, thanks! I'm currently on my way to work, what are you up to?
I'm getting ready to go to the gym to lift weights, then I'm going to take a walk around the park.
That sounds like a great way to start the day! I'm not much of a gym person, but I love walking around the park.
It's a great way to de-stress and get some fresh air. Do you have any pets?
I have a dog named Petrucci, he's a 10 year old golden retriever. He's my best friend.
Aww, that sounds adorable. I've always wanted a dog, but I don't have the time for one right now.
They're definitely a lot of work, but they're so worth it.
I'm sure they are. Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to cook, and I love trying new recipes. I also like to read, and I'm a big fan of horror movies.
I love to cook too! I'm not very good at it, but I enjoy it. I also love to read, but I'm more of a romance novel kind of person.
I love romance novels too! They're so easy to get lost in.
I know, right? It's like you're living in another world.
Exactly! So, what are you looking for in a relationship?
I'm looking for someone who is kind, funny, and intelligent. I also want someone who is interested in spirituality.
That sounds like a great list of qualities. I'm sure you'll find someone who is perfect for you.
